name: Demon Tails
description:
Relax and play as young Demon Girl called Puck who is interested in learning about the magical qualities and mysterious of her land. You seek out an angelic being called Raziel, who is an entity that holds vast knowledge of the land of Mornmoon.

He provides two options to explore!

These options are ‘Magic & Spellcasting’ and ‘Plants & Fungi’. Each of these proficiencies lead you to a new NPC that will educate you about their specific ability and expertise. ‘Magic and Spellcasting’ will lead you to a Witch called Rifirith and ‘Plants & Fungi’ will lead you to Goblin called Flapjack.

Your goal is to explore and have fun!

By the end of each encounter, you may be awarded with a potion depending on your choices made within the gameplay! You can play the game again and choose a different route to collect both potions to achieve the best ending. Friendship badges will also be rewarded to players who create positive impacts and friendships towards the NPC’s. 

Mouse Controls:

Left Click: Advances dialogue 

Middle Click: Hides the user interface

Right Click: Accesses the game menu

Mouse wheel up/Click Rollback side: Rolls back to earlier dialogue

Mouse wheel down: Rolls forward to later dialogue
